0:
host_script="/hostshm/smart_tbw_monitor.sh"
cat <<"EOF" > $host_script
declare -A tbw multipliers
tbw=(
  ["Samsung SSD 860"]="2400"
  ["Samsung SSD 970 EVO Plus 2TB"]="1200"
  ["WDC WDS400T1R0A"]="2500"
)
multipliers=(
  ["Samsung SSD 860"]="1"
  ["Samsung SSD 970 EVO Plus 2TB"]="10000"
  ["WDC WDS400T1R0A"]="1000000"
)
set -m
devices=$(lsblk | grep -E 'sda\s+|nvme0n1\s+' | awk '{print $1}')
for device in $${devices[@]}; do
  smart_output_line=$(smartctl -A /dev/$device | grep Written)
  lba_size_bytes=$(fdisk /dev/$device -l | grep 'Units' | awk '{print $8}')
  model=$(fdisk /dev/$device -l | grep model | sed -E 's/.*: //g' | awk '{$1=$1};1')
  multiplier=$${multipliers["$model"]}
  if [[ $smart_output_line =~ "LBA" ]]; then
    measurement=$(echo "$smart_output_line" | awk '{print $10}')
  elif [[ $smart_output_line =~ "Data" ]]; then
    measurement=$(echo "$smart_output_line" | awk '{print $4}' | tr -d ',')
  fi
  ssd_bytes_written=$(( measurement * lba_size_bytes * multiplier ))
  mfr_tbw=$${tbw["$model"]}
  percent_tbw_used=$(echo "scale=2; ( $ssd_bytes_written / 1000 / 1000 / 1000 / 1000) / $mfr_tbw" | bc -l)
  echo "$device,$model,$mfr_tbw,$ssd_bytes_written,$percent_tbw_used"
done
EOF
chroot /host bash /dev/shm/smart_tbw_monitor.sh
host_script="/hostshm/smart_temp_monitor.sh"
cat <<"EOF" > $host_script
set -m
devices=$(lsblk | grep -E 'sda\\s+|nvme0n1\\s+' | awk '{print $1}')
for device in $${devices[@]}; do
  smart_output_line=$(smartctl -A /dev/$device | grep Cel)
  model=$(fdisk /dev/$device -l | grep model | sed -E 's/.*: //g')
  if [[ $model =~ "Samsung SSD 860" ]]; then
    sensor=$(echo $smart_output_line | cut -f 2 -d' ')
    value=$(echo $smart_output_line | sed 's/ Celsius//g' | awk '{print $NF}')
  elif [[ $model =~ "WDC WDS400T1R0A" ]]; then
    sensor=$(echo $smart_output_line | cut -f 2 -d' ')
    value=$(echo $smart_output_line | sed 's/ Celsius//g' | awk '{print $10}')
  elif [[ $model =~ "Samsung SSD 970 EVO Plus 2TB" ]]; then
    sensor=$(echo $smart_output_line | sed 's/:.*//g')
    value=$(echo $smart_output_line | sed -E 's/.*\:\s+([0-9]+).*/\1/g')
  fi
  echo "$sensor,$model,$value"
done
EOF
chroot /host bash /dev/shm/smart_temp_monitor.sh
for sensor in /sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone*/temp; do 
  echo "$(echo $sensor|sed -E 's/.*(th.*[0-9]).*/\\1/g'),$(echo $sensor|sed -E 's/.*(th.*[0-9]).*/\\1/g'),$(( $(cat $sensor) / 1000 ))" 
done

[FILTER]
    Name                kubernetes
    Match               kube.*
    # We need the full DNS suffix as Windows only supports resolving names with this suffix
    # See: https://kubernetes.io/docs/setup/production-environment/windows/intro-windows-in-kubernetes/#dns-limitations
    Kube_URL            https://kubernetes.default.svc.cluster.local:443
    Buffer_Size         $${K8S_BUFFER_SIZE}
    K8S-Logging.Exclude $${K8S_LOGGING_EXCLUDE}

[FILTER]
    Name           record_modifier
    Match          *
    Record         cluster_name $${CLUSTER_NAME}

# Filter pings from oauth2-proxy
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    kube.*
    Exclude  log GET \\- \\"/ping\\"

# Filter kube-probe
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    kube.*
    Exclude  log kube\\-probe

# Filter nzbget/ingress jsonrpc hits
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    kube.*
    Exclude  log /POST \\/jsonrpc/ 

# Filter nextcloud propfind
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    kube.*
    Exclude  log /PROPFIND \\/remote\\.php\\/dav\\/files\\/tyler/ 

# Filter New Relic event truncated messages
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    kube.*
    Exclude  log /event truncated to NRDB limit/ 

# Filter wordpress
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    kube.*
    Exclude  log /GET \\/wp-login\\.php/ 

# Filter flux reconciliations
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    kube.*
    Exclude  log /([Rr]econcili?ation finished in|All dependencies are ready, proceeding with reconciliation)/

# Filter etcd status checks
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    kube.*
    Exclude  log /etcdserver\\/api\\/etcdhttp: \\/health OK \\(status code 200\\)/

# Filter longhorn instance manager debug
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    kube.*
    Exclude  log /longhorn\\-instance\\-manager.*debug/

# Filter unwanted containers
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    *
    Exclude  $kubernetes['container_name'] /(kube\\-events|calico\\-node|oauth2\\-proxy|kube\\-apiserver|mosquitto|event\\-exporter)/

# Filter unwanted namespaces
[FILTER]
    Name     grep
    Match    *
    Exclude  $kubernetes['namespace_name'] /(metallb\\-system)/

[ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "APC Back-UPS RS 900G"
  vendorid = 051d
  productid = 0002
  serial = 3B1227X00136

[monuser]
  password = secret
  upsmon slave
[monmaster]
  password = secret
  upsmon master

server_url: https://${APP_DNS_HEADSCALE}:443
listen_addr: 0.0.0.0:8080
metrics_listen_addr: 0.0.0.0:9090
grpc_listen_addr: 127.0.0.1:50443
grpc_allow_insecure: false
private_key_path: /etc/headscale/private.key
noise:
  private_key_path: /etc/headscale/noise_private.key
db_type: postgres
db_host: pg-default-rw.pg.svc.cluster.local.
db_port: 5432
db_name: ${SECRET_HEADSCALE_PG_DBNAME}
db_user: ${SECRET_HEADSCALE_PG_USER}
db_pass: ${SECRET_HEADSCALE_PG_PASS}
db_ssl: true
tls_cert_path: "/tls/fullchain.pem"
tls_key_path: "/tls/privkey.pem"
log:
  format: json
  level: info
logtail:
  enabled: false
#acl_policy_path: "/etc/headscale/acl.hujson"
ip_prefixes:
  - ${CONFIG_HEADSCALE_IPV4}
randomize_client_port: false
dns_config:
  magic_dns: true
  base_domain: ${DNS_SHORT}
  override_local_dns: true
  nameservers:
    - ${IP_HOME_DNS}
  domains:
    - ${DNS_SHORT}
derp:
  server:
    enabled: true
    region_id: 999
    region_code: "Biohazard"
    region_name: "Biohazard-Home-Relay"
    stun_listen_addr: "0.0.0.0:3478"
  urls:
    - https://controlplane.tailscale.com/derpmap/default
  paths: []
  auto_update_enabled: true
  update_frequency: 24h
disable_check_updates: true
ephemeral_node_inactivity_timeout: 30m
node_update_check_interval: 10s
oidc:
  only_start_if_oidc_is_available: true
  issuer: "${SECRET_HEADSCALE_OIDC_URL}"
  client_id: "${SECRET_HEADSCALE_OIDC_ID}"
  client_secret: "${SECRET_HEADSCALE_OIDC_SECRET}"
  scope: ["openid", "profile", "email"]
  expiry: 30d
  use_expiry_from_token: false
  extra_params:
    domain_hint: ${DNS_MAIN}
  allowed_domains:
    - ${APP_DNS_AUTH}
    - ${DNS_MAIN}

domain = "${APP_DNS_KANIDM}"
origin = "https://${APP_DNS_KANIDM}"
tls_chain = "/tls/fullchain.pem"
tls_key = "/tls/privkey.pem"
role = "WriteReplica"
log_level = "verbose"
bindaddress = "[::]:8443"
ldapbindaddress = "[::]:3636"
trust_x_forward_for = true
db_path = "/data/kanidm.db"
db_fs_type = "other"
[online_backup]
path = "/backup/"
schedule = "0 0 22 * * * *"
versions = 7

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>

<Server version="8">
  <Name>${CONFIG_OVENMEDIAENGINE_NAME}</Name>
  <Type>origin</Type>
  <IP>*</IP>
  <PrivacyProtection>false</PrivacyProtection>
  <StunServer>stun.l.google.com:19302</StunServer>

  <Modules>
    <HTTP2>
      <Enable>true</Enable>
    </HTTP2>
    <LLHLS>
      <Enable>true</Enable>
    </LLHLS>
    <P2P>
      <!-- disabled by default, experimental -->
      <Enable>true</Enable>
      <MaxClientPeersPerHostPeer>2</MaxClientPeersPerHostPeer>
    </P2P>
  </Modules>

  <Bind>
    <Providers>
      <RTSPC>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </RTSPC>
      <OVT>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </OVT>
      <RTMP>
        <Port>$${env:OME_RTMP_PROV_PORT:1935}</Port>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </RTMP>
      <SRT>
        <Port>$${env:OME_SRT_PROV_PORT:9999}</Port>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </SRT>
      <MPEGTS>
        <Port>$${env:OME_MPEGTS_PROV_PORT:4000-4005/udp}</Port>
      </MPEGTS>
      <WebRTC>
        <Signalling>
          <TLSPort>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_SIGNALLING_TLS_PORT:3334}</TLSPort>
          <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
        </Signalling>
        <IceCandidates>
          <IceCandidate>$${env:OME_HOST_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_PORT:10000-10004/udp}</IceCandidate>
          <TcpRelay>$${env:OME_HOST_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_TCP_RELAY_PORT:3477}</TcpRelay>
          <TcpForce>true</TcpForce>
          <TcpRelayWorkerCount>1</TcpRelayWorkerCount>
        </IceCandidates>
      </WebRTC>
    </Providers>

    <Publishers>
      <OVT>
        <Port>$${env:OME_ORIGIN_PORT:9000}</Port>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </OVT>
      <LLHLS>
        <TLSPort>$${env:OME_LLHLS_STREAM_TLS_PORT:3334}</TLSPort>
        <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
      </LLHLS>
      <WebRTC>
        <Signalling>
          <TLSPort>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_SIGNALLING_TLS_PORT:3334}</TLSPort>
          <WorkerCount>1</WorkerCount>
        </Signalling>
        <IceCandidates>
          <IceCandidate>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_PORT:10000-10004/udp}</IceCandidate>
          <TcpRelay>$${env:OME_WEBRTC_CANDIDATE_IP:*}:$${env:OME_WEBRTC_TCP_RELAY_PORT:3477}</TcpRelay>
          <TcpForce>true</TcpForce>
          <TcpRelayWorkerCount>1</TcpRelayWorkerCount>
        </IceCandidates>
      </WebRTC>
    </Publishers>
  </Bind>

  <VirtualHosts>
    <VirtualHost include="VHost*.xml" />
    <VirtualHost>
      <Name>default</Name>
      <Distribution>${APP_DNS_OVENMEDIAENGINE}</Distribution>

      <Host>
        <Names>
          <Name>${APP_DNS_OVENMEDIAENGINE}</Name>
          <Name>${APP_IP_OVENMEDIAENGINE}</Name>
        </Names>
        <TLS>
          <CertPath>/tls/server.pem</CertPath>
          <KeyPath>/ssl/tls.key</KeyPath>
          <ChainCertPath>/tls/ca.pem</ChainCertPath>
        </TLS>
      </Host>

      <CrossDomains>
        <Url>*</Url>
      </CrossDomains>

      <Applications>
        <Application>
          <Name>app</Name>
          <Type>live</Type>
          <OutputProfiles>
            <HardwareAcceleration>false</HardwareAcceleration>
            <OutputProfile>
              <Name>stream</Name>
              <OutputStreamName>$${OriginStreamName}</OutputStreamName>

              <Playlist>
                <Name>watch</Name>
                <FileName>watch</FileName>
                <Options>
                  <WebRtcAutoAbr>true</WebRtcAutoAbr>
                </Options>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>direct</Name>
                  <Video>bypass_video</Video>
                  <Audio>bypass_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_5fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_h264_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_30fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_1080p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_1080p_5fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_720p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>webrtc_vp8_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_vp8_720p_30fps</Video>
                  <Audio>opus_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_1080p_5fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_60fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
                <Rendition>
                  <Name>llhls_h264_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Video>video_h264_720p_30fps</Video>
                  <Audio>aac_audio</Audio>
                </Rendition>
              </Playlist>

              <Encodes>
                <Video>
                  <Name>bypass_video</Name>
                  <Bypass>true</Bypass>
                </Video>
                <Audio>
                  <Name>bypass_audio</Name>
                  <Bypass>true</Bypass>
                </Audio>
                <Audio>
                  <Name>aac_audio</Name>
                  <Codec>aac</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>256000</Bitrate>
                  <Samplerate>48000</Samplerate>
                  <Channel>2</Channel>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Audio>
                <Audio>
                  <Name>opus_audio</Name>
                  <Codec>opus</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>256000</Bitrate>
                  <Samplerate>48000</Samplerate>
                  <Channel>2</Channel>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Audio>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>10000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>75000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>5</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>slow</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>6000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_h264_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Codec>h264</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>3000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>faster</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_1080p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>10000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_1080p_5fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>75000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>1080</Height>
                  <Framerate>5</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>slow</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_720p_60fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>6000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>fast</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
                <Video>
                  <Name>video_vp8_720p_30fps</Name>
                  <Codec>vp8</Codec>
                  <Bitrate>3000000</Bitrate>
                  <Height>720</Height>
                  <Framerate>60</Framerate>
                  <KeyFrameInterval>2</KeyFrameInterval>
                  <BFrames>0</BFrames>
                  <Preset>faster</Preset>
                  <BypassIfMatch>
                    <Codec>eq</Codec>
                    <Width>eq</Width>
                  </BypassIfMatch>
                </Video>
              </Encodes>
            </OutputProfile>
          </OutputProfiles>
          <Providers>
            <OVT />
            <WebRTC>
              <Timeout>30000</Timeout>
              <CrossDomains>
                <Url>*</Url>
              </CrossDomains>
            </WebRTC>
            <RTMP />
            <SRT />
            <RTSPPull />
            <MPEGTS>
              <StreamMap>
                  <Stream>
                    <Name>stream_$${Port}</Name>
                    <Port>$${env:OME_MPEGTS_PROV_PORT:4000-4005/udp}</Port>
                  </Stream>
              </StreamMap>
            </MPEGTS>
          </Providers>
          <Publishers>
            <AppWorkerCount>1</AppWorkerCount>
            <StreamWorkerCount>8</StreamWorkerCount>
            <OVT />
            <WebRTC>
              <Timeout>30000</Timeout>
              <Rtx>false</Rtx>
              <Ulpfec>false</Ulpfec>
              <JitterBuffer>false</JitterBuffer>
            </WebRTC>
            <LLHLS>
              <OriginMode>true</OriginMode>
              <ChunkDuration>0.5</ChunkDuration>
              <!-- PartHoldBack SHOULD be at least three times the Part Target Duration -->
              <PartHoldBack>1.5</PartHoldBack>
              <SegmentDuration>6</SegmentDuration>
              <SegmentCount>10</SegmentCount>
              <CrossDomains>
                <Url>*</Url>
              </CrossDomains>
            </LLHLS>
          </Publishers>
        </Application>
      </Applications>
    </VirtualHost>
  </VirtualHosts>
</Server>

awk -v cert_num=0 "split_after==1 {n++;split_after=0} /-----END CERTIFICATE-----/ {split_after=1} n==cert_num {print}" /ssl/tls.crt > /tls/server.pem && awk -v cert_num=1 "split_after==1 {n++;split_after=0} /-----END CERTIFICATE-----/ {split_after=1} n==cert_num {print}" /ssl/tls.crt > /tls/ca.pem && awk -v cert_num=2 "split_after==1 {n++;split_after=0} /-----END CERTIFICATE-----/ {split_after=1} n==cert_num {print}" /ssl/tls.crt >> /tls/ca.pem
